ROOT:
-- DaoOrder_Details_S3_Update -- 2014/2/9 日立 太郎 UPDATE [Order Details] SET
[OrderID] = @Set_OrderID_forUPD, [ProductID] = @Set_ProductID_forUPD, [UnitPrice] = @Set_UnitPrice_forUPD, [Quantity] = @Set_Quantity_forUPD, [Discount] = @Set_Discount_forUPD,
WHERE [OrderID] = @OrderID AND [ProductID] = @ProductID
